tweet.text: In honor of #ArchivesGIFgiving, we present our friends at @Dodis this GIF of First Lady Pat Nixon admiring the panda given to the US by the PRC. Diplomacy takes all forms! For more panda-related content, search in #FRUS: https://t.co/9Cceuefswu https://t.co/IGvGxDlOD0
